greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Riordan array (f(x), x*f(x)) where f(x) is the g.f. of A168491.
comment: Equal to B^(-2)*A054336, B = A007318. T(n,0)=(-1)^n*A000108(n). Unsigned version in A033184.
formula: T(n,k) = T(n-1,k-1) - T(n-1,k) + sum_{i, i>=0} T(n-1,k+1+i)*(-1)^i. - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 23 2012
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Dec 11 2009
